text: Nnan imazanen nnsen: "day illa ccekk di Öebbi, Axellaq n tmurt akked igenwan? Inecced ikwen id, iwakken ad awen Isemmeê kra ibekkaven nnwen, a kwen Ioo ar lajel ipwassnen". Nnan: "kunwi, s tidep, d imdanen kan, am nekwni. Teb$am ad a$ tesîixxôem, seg wayen llan âabden imezwura nne$. Awit a$ d adabu n ûûeê".
